bibl.title: New Greek Texts from Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.note: In June 2009, the British Academy hosted a workshop to discuss some of the exciting new texts pieced together by the Oxyrhynchus Papyri project - followed in the evening by a public presentation. The author describes how these fragmentary documents give a unique insight into Greco-Roman civilisation.
PARSONS Peter, New Greek Texts from Oxyrhynchus.
British Academy Review 14 (November 2009) pp. 28-31, 4 figg. n./bl. et coul.
